body:
Well, just came back cuz of the tourney and actually had a chance to get into an invis for the 1st time, but if all this bs about us getting dq'd and bl'd for the next/future tourneys is true then im out

(might come if we arent bl'd, will come back if were still in the invis somehow... ripperonis when all the bs is true)

title: Later...

replies.body:
I'm pretty sure Labradoodles got DQ'd as a final desision, sorry.

Well, it's been nice seeing you around. Have fun in life.
